title: Wednesday Post Show (4-21-21)
itunes:title: Wednesday Post Show (4-21-21)
description:
Bobby on a study that men who wear big logos on their shirts are more likely to be promiscuous. Raymundo gives an update on his wife’s surrogacy and how much it would cost. He also shares an update about the country singer who he thinks wrote a song about him. Lunchbox spills the tea on Scuba Steve who he says left work to carry bags for her.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
